snippet: The Frieze art fair in London this year is joined by Frieze Masters, across Regent’s Park from the older show.
abstract: Frieze art fair in London this year is joined by Frieze Masters, separate show across Regent’s Park that features artwork made before 2000; additional exhibit is clever expansion of Frieze's brand, designed to capitalize on the thousands of art world figures that arrive in London every October.
lead_paragraph: The Frieze art fair in London this year is joined by Frieze Masters, across Regent’s Park from the older show.

headline.seo: Frieze Art Fair in London Adds Masters Show
headline.main: A Sibling for a Shiny Art Show in London
headline.print_headline: A Sibling for a Shiny Art Show in London
